exmls.content:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="LoadingSceneSkin" width="1136" height="640" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Label id="lbLoad" verticalCenter="188" horizontalCenter="1" textColor="0xF3BB13" bold="true" text="0%"/>
	<e:Image source="load_img_002_png" verticalCenter="150.5" horizontalCenter="0.5"/>
	<e:Image id="spLoadFrg" source="load_img_003_png" x="236" y="464" scale9Grid="5,5,14,3" width="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="LoginSceneSkin" width="1136" height="640" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Label text="测试:caishen,123456" y="141" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Label text="用户名:" x="358" y="242"/>
	<e:Label text="密码:" x="384" y="335"/>
	<e:Label id="lbLogin" text="登录" x="536" y="486"/>
	<e:EditableText id="edtUserName" width="378" height="52" x="467" y="233" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="left" textColor="0xF51212" prompt="请输入用户名" maxChars="11"/>
	<e:EditableText id="edtPassword" x="467" y="324" textColor="0xF51212" textAlign="left" width="378" verticalAlign="middle" height="52" prompt="请输入密码" displayAsPassword="true" maxChars="16"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="MainSceneSkin" width="1136" height="640" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group id="groupBG" top="0" bottom="0" left="0" right="0">
		<e:Image source="main_img_001_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="groupUI" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
</e:Skin>
